alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 11:14AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN BAYFIELD AND CENTRAL DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM CDT... At 1114 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Range, to 7 miles southwest of Hawthorne, to 10 miles north of Dairyland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hawthorne around 1130 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Poplar, Lake Nebagamon, Maple, Brule and Solon Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
